abstract: Panasonic is investing $30 million in Tesla Motors, the U.S. maker of electric sports cars, eyeing expansion in the global market for green vehicles, the companies said Thursday.
snippet: Panasonic is investing $30 million in Tesla Motors, the U.S. maker of electric sports cars, eyeing expansion in the global market for green vehicles, the companies said Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Looking to the expansion in the global market for green vehicles, Panasonic is investing $30 million in Tesla Motors, the American maker of electric sports cars, the companies said on Thursday.
